column5: How is the park and it's lakes (Restoule/Stormy/Clear) for boating?  Recently did Massasauga and it is littered with hidden rocks and shoals, so I treaded very lightly.  Anyone have any experience navigating those waters? How's the channel from stormy to clear? I'm told it's very narrow but unsure of depth / rocks.  Cheers
I have to give props to bowslayer too, he pm'd me some really good info on Restoule as well.  Thanks again dude.
Did you end up going dutch? I'm going in the next 2 weeks for sure
I have found two submerged rocks on Woods Bay/Blackstone- the hard way! Trolling speed only though so no damage. Heading up in the morning and will be very careful with the new boat.
You mean in Massasauga? Shoals and rocks everywhere.  Hopefully Stormy is less eventful.
Looks like the trip has been postponed to next weekend... due to gf having a late meeting @ work Fri  Thanks all for the help especially cram and bow slayer
